EmailTemplate.name: ITM.Send Email 5.Email 5
EmailTemplate.subject: Still Wondering if an ITM Is for {{company.Company Name:default=your Financial Institution}}?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What's the Real Value of ITMs for your Financial Institution ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Whether creating new digital zones to reduce your branch footprint, expanding hours without expanding costs or innovating your front and back office, ITM technology can significantly enhance your customer experience…and your experience, too.
In fact, ITMs can handle 95% of all transactions, while providing safer “face-to-face” service.
Still not sure? See what The Financial Brand has to say about ITMs in our new ebook. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
